column1:
Are there any redditors here from the overseas territories (Bermuda, Falklands, the Caymans, St. Helena, etc)? If so, how close do you feel towards the mainland UK?


I'm also going to include Gibraltar even though it's still in Europe.

I just bought a pineapple from the Co-op for 79p. It's from Costa Rica and weighs about half a kilo. How is that possible


Apart from the sheer brazen illegality of even attempting to buy this (I can only assume the co-op have really good lawyers to get past the pineapple importation ban), how many people in that supply chain are getting massively fucked?
